name: Tarrabah
flavor_text: We walk where our ancestors once walked.

frame.name: Ravenous Beast
frame.description:
This weapon stores power when dealing or receiving damage.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Unleashes the beast when full.

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description: Dealing continuous damage extends the duration of Ravenous Beast.
perks.name: Bottomless Appetite

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
